English: Lizard guide to vic2 mp part 1!\nalliances\n

Key:
only ally for your nations best interests, or for the sake of having a fun war. if you won't get a fun war strictly following your best interests, adjust accordingly. if you're not a brainlet you'll find this fairly intuitive and understand that a victory isnt a victory if you just waste your time kicking the shit out of a weaker side. that said you can definitely take  worrying about balance too far and become a low functioning autist
your interests can be mechanical with pops/cores or natural based on geography or both. for example, Austria and germany may be mechanical enemies but their geography pushes them to ally and unite against france and russia. dont ally people who accept or core a lot of your country and you should kill those people 90% of the time. In general always be trying to gain something by making your neighbors weaker relative to yourself, pretty simple
industry
industry is like the easiest thing ever but somehow everyone fucks it up, build military factories and give them promotion priority, if you're an illiterate country like russia focus on national focus and then education techs to get your clergy up to 4% everywhere before promoting craftsmen. otherwise use national focuses to promote bureaucrats to 100% national efficiency, clergymen to 2% total and then soldiers/craftsmen as needed.
military
"It is better to be on hand with ten men than absent with ten thousand.” - Timur
this guy fucked more women than this entire community combined to so he knows what he's talking about. the most important thing to understand is unit concentration which gets less important as the game goes on eventually dissolving into frontline warfare with the machine gun tech. even so have your units where they matter and you can easily defeat superior forces as I often have.
I'm a top ten player and everything I said is objectively correct, take it or leave it and if you dont like it you're probably a virgin so idgaf.

Polish: Un tentativo nuevo orden reina en Europa. La Francia de Napole?n desafi? a sus enemigos y ahora se alza victoriosa y triunfante en Europa occidental, con todos sus rivales humillados. Pero, a pesar de la victoria, la paz no le sali? barata: a cambio de una paz duradera, Francia acept? limitar su dominio directo a las tierras situadas al oeste del Rin y conceder autonom?a a algunos de sus anteriores s?bditos. El futuro es incierto. Los austriacos y prusianos, resentidos, siguen astillando los m?rgenes de la influencia francesa, a la espera de ver si el joven imperio se tambalea. Y con el creciente burbujeo del nacionalismo y la creciente industrializaci?n en todo el continente, las luchas internas amenazan con volver a poner en peligro la paz en Europa. Mientras tanto, los restos del Reino Unido, exiliados y destrozados, con sus aliados nativos americanos, se enzarzan en una amarga lucha de contenci?n contra el expansionismo americano. El resultado de la guerra podr?a decidir el destino no s?lo de Am?rica del Norte, sino del Imperio Brit?nico en general.

English: We have called all Germans to unite against the French!
Spanish: !Hemos llamado a todos los alemanes a unirse contra los franceses!

English: After the death of the dictator Napoleon the 1st, France can rejoice with the 2nd Republic!
Spanish: ?Después de la muerte del dictador Napoleón I, Francia puede regocijarse con la 2? República!

English: Seeing how France was left after the Napoleonic wars and the end of Napoleon reign, Alexandre has enacted a lot of reforms to better the working condition of a lot of people as well as the commerce inside the nation
Spanish: Al ver cómo quedó Francia después de las guerras napoleónicas y el final del reinado de Napoleón, Alexandre ha promulgado muchas reformas para mejorar las condiciones laborales de muchas personas, así como el comercio dentro de la nación.

English: Continuing his reforms, he significantly improved on the daily life of the people as population is stagnating in France while its exploding in the other parts of Europe
Spanish: Continuando con sus reformas, mejoró significativamente la vida cotidiana de las personas, ya que la población se estanca en Francia mientras que se dispara en otras partes de Europa.

English: It's time to teach the French ways to those Germans to further their integration inside our empire!
Spanish: ?Es hora de ense?ar las formas francesas a esos alemanes para promover su integración dentro de nuestro imperio!
